data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Pseudoechthistatus Pic (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae, Lamiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bi, Wen-Xuan, Lin, Mei-Ying (2016): A revision of the genus Pseudoechthistatus Pic (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae, Lamiini). ZooKeys 604: 49-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.604.9049, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.604.9049
